description.original: Finds images in the vault that are not linked to any notes. Either lists, or deletes them.
description.translation: 查找库中未链接到任何注释的图像，列出或删除它们。

dict.Notice(`Found ${a.length} orphaned image: Notice(`发现 ${a.length} 个孤立图像，已创建注释或更新了详细信息。`)
dict.Notice(\"No orphaned images found to del: Notice("未找到要删除的孤立图像。")
dict.Notice(`Note \"${g}\" created or updated: Notice(`请注意，"${g}" 是使用孤立图像创建或更新的。`)
dict.Notice(\"Failed to create or update note: Notice("无法创建或更新带有孤立图像的注释。")
dict..log(\"Loading Find Orphaned Images Plug: .log("正在加载“查找孤立图像”插件")
dict.text:\"Create a Report or Delete the Ima: text:"创建报告还是删除图像？"
dict..setDesc(\"Create a report with embedded: .setDesc("创建带有嵌入图像的报告，这将在注释中显示图像。")
dict..setDesc(\"Create a report with text lin: .setDesc("创建包含图片文本链接的报告，这不会在笔记中显示图片。")
dict..setDesc(\"Delete the X images found in: .setDesc("删除保管库中找到的 X 个图像，X 是设置中定义的最大删除数量。")
dict..setDesc(\"Comma-separated list of image: .setDesc("要查找的图像扩展名的逗号分隔列表。")
dict..setDesc(\"Maximum number of orphaned im: .setDesc("要删除的孤立图像的最大数量（-1 表示无限制）。")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable or disable the sidebar: .setDesc("启用或禁用侧边栏按钮来查找孤立图像。")
